response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product not only offers unparalleled functionality but also comes with a suite of features that cater to a wide range of needs, making it an invaluable asset for any organization looking to streamline operations and enhance productivity.

Given its exceptional capabilities and the extensive research and development efforts invested into its creation, we believe the fair market value of this product exceeds $1,000,000. However, recognizing the importance of finding the right buyer who will appreciate and utilize its full potential, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000.

Please consider this offer carefully. We are confident that once you experience the benefits and capabilities of this product, you will see its true value far surpassing the investment made. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Looking forward to the possibility of working with you,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
